snippet: The suspension is the second this year for the Shabab militant group, but there appeared to be little standing in the way of the group’s starting a new account.
abstract: Twitter suspends Shabab miltant group's account, home to a stream of messages at once threatening and mocking, for second time in one year; suspension takes away group's platform for communicating swiftly and seamlessly beyond the borders of Somalia.
lead_paragraph: The suspension is the second this year for the Shabab militant group, but there appeared to be little standing in the way of the group’s starting a new account.

headline.main: Twitter Suspends Somali Militants’ Account, Cutting a Link to the Wider World
headline.print_headline: Twitter Suspends Somali Militants’ Account, Cutting a Link to the Wider World
